channel.title: Comments on: Odd Incarnations: The Bunker Hill of Towne’s Ask the Dust

item.title: By: Castle dweller
item.dc:creator: Castle dweller
item.description: Thanks Nathan for this deconstruction of the old Bunker Hill in "Ask the Dust." As someone who actually lived on and remembers the old Bunker Hill, I agree that the incarnation in the film was "weird," but deliciously so. Lets do shoot old L.A. and make that Bunker Hill movie. I'll be one of the "crazy people" and I have twelve dollars.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Nathan for this deconstruction of the old Bunker Hill in “Ask the Dust.” As someone who actually lived on and remembers the old Bunker Hill, I agree that the incarnation in the film was “weird,” but deliciously so. Lets do shoot old L.A. and make that Bunker Hill movie. I’ll be one of the “crazy people” and I have twelve dollars.
